name: Color Ranger 2
author: QooQee.com
description:
All-new design! Version 2 allows you to apply adjustments live at any stage of your design. Now you can adjust brightness, contrast, hue and alpha channel on shapes, strokes, and texts.


New features:

𝟭. 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀: Filtering colors for better targeting.
𝟮. 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽𝘀 & 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗲𝗮𝘁 𝗴𝗿𝗶𝗱𝘀: Advanced targetting the elements within groups and nested groups.
𝟯. 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘂𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀: The new panel design allows you to apply changes live as you make the adjustments.
